caption: Great drinks, delicious burgers
Their Oysters are delicious, but so are their Appetizers & main plates. Their service has always been friendly & accommodating.
Very good oysters, nice atmosphere.
Nice little hide away spot in downtown Troy NY with a great menu and good, attentive, staff
Great food great service
Wow it was delicious,  we had  great service. The drinks were right on the money.
Good quality food, very kind, but not experienced service for the price.

My wife and I came here on a whim and we are SO glad that we did. The drinks were on point (recommend the Thirst Trap) and the escargot was to die for. The wait staff was friendly and very understanding. We had the seared duck breast and …
Went to happy hour for oysters and cocktails, prices were very reasonable for happy hour and we enjoyed the ambiance
Love this upscale oyster bar in Troy.
The best of the best. The best cocktails, the freshest oysters, and the warmest, most welcoming staff.
Love the food, especially roasted brussel sprouts with nuts, the Sinsabagh cocktail and great servers. Heidi and her team have created a Troy treasure.
Wonderful atmosphere and amazing food and drinks. Great service too
Great oysters!  Fantastic ambiance. Love it.

The food was delicious,  the non-alcoholic drinks were amazing. I had walked in off the street and  asked if they could host a vegan and they did an awesome job, my wife and I will be back soon. The perfect date night.......thanks Eric.
We went for the oysters but ended up ordering an entree as well. The food is a little pricey so we stuck with burgers and fries.  The food is uniquely seasoned and satisfying.
Wonderful meal.
Always a favorite!!
Love this restaurant! Just wish the music was more relaxing..we would have stayed for dinner, but at our age, the music was screaming..couldn't tolerate much more..
Hands down the best restaurant in Troy! Amazing oyster choices, daily specials, vegan/vegetarian options, AND SO MUCH MORE!and an INCREDIBLE STAFF!! Go to PLUMB! YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED 😀

Had the halibut and smoked oysters, they were both fantastic. The halibut was delicate and paired wonderfully with their chowder it was served on. The oysters were very different and a surprise how good they were.
Place is nice. Oyser was good however one of dinner we order "KOREAN BBQ jackfruits 🌮"  that was awful..no flavor. 0 stars
Loved the food here. You can't beat dollar oysters for happy hour
Excellent
Just ok
Pricey for Troy ....

Love, Love this place. You never feel out of place whether with girlfriends  or a date or family.  $1.00 dollar oysters during M-F happy hour 4 to 6 pm. How can you beat this?  $4 Prosecos or larger for $6.   I could go every night.  I'll take you when I win the Lottery.w🐱🐱🐱🎃

Blown away! Plumb Oyster Bar is high quality, well thought out, dining at it's best.  After looking at the menu choices for Troy Restaurant Week, we decided to check out one of the few places that wasn't a pub. And boy did we luck out! The …
Awesome restuarant with great tasting food.
Foods Great, the could lower their prices and do better!
Limited menu. Tables available outside.
Delicious food, delicious oysters. Nice ambience, friendly.
Best oysters in Troy
Lovely place with attentive service. I loved the steak and the oysters!
Great selection of oysters. Very fresh. All food was creative and ambience/ service great.

Caesar salad was awful. No parmesan cheese,some thing that looked and tasted like goldfish crackers  crumble on top..gross. Risotto must be al dente..this one was reheated. Shishito peppers were half burned,half uncooked. I hate giving bad reviews but this dinner was so bad...
Amazing little spot: food, bar, and service!
Nice atmosphere, good wine

This place was one of my favorite but it’s trending down a bit. Service was not good at all and they had no oysters. Yes they had no oysters at an oyster bar. Chicken was good. Hopefully they where just having a bad night.

Great happy hour deals on drinks & $1 oysters. Staff were friendly and the decor is really nice. Very modern, open and fresh feel. I ordered an old fashioned and it was amazing. I was not a huge fan of the calamari. I appreciated the crisp batter, but the calamari itself was over cooked. I also wish there was more sauce drizzled on it.
Everything was superb. From the drinks to the food. If you are in the area try it. Atmosphere is very personal and romantic. I came for my birthday.  You won't be disappointed.  😁
Amazing oysters, Amazing drinks, Great entrees, service and staff are friendly. Wish they had a few more seats though ! Great Place
One of the best happy hours in Troy, staff is always very attentive and friendly.

First off, the main reason I went there was for scallops but they were out. However the mushroom rice dish with or without duck was good. I was surprised to see that a shot of Titos (vodka) was $14.50. I think that's outrageous but I just …
Great old fashions

The bartenders were very professional and friendly. The drinks were amazing. Looking forward to going back to try the food. This is not a place to go if your looking for a cheaper place to eat, however they have good happy hour drink specials.
Awesome

I was recommended Plumb Oyster Bar by my boss and I decided to take my mom who was visiting. I ordered the steak frites and a dozen oysters I shared with my mom. The flavor of the steak and balsamic sauce was delicious. My mom ordered …

Love, love, love! Delicious cocktails and oysters. The cheese board was divine and fresh!!! Saturday happy hour was simply the best. The service was friendly and attentive. We were very impressed.  Will stop in again the next time we are in town.
Some of the best food and drinks in the Capital Region
Great food meat interior

This is a great addition to downtown Troy with the addition of the oysters. The second bar makes excellent cocktails which creates a fun atmosphere for a stop at night.  I’ve had a few items off their menu and really like the brunch which is a nice stop especially in the summer during the farmers market.
Amazing staff and atmosphere and even more amazing food. Highly recommend it for anyone looking for a nice night out.
Great addition to Troy.  I've had dinners,  private events and casual drinks here.   It's an honest and authentic place.   I love it.

I'm a fan, I've been there countless times I've never had a bad meal.  I have even ordered food outside of my pallet (veggie burgers) and still enjoyed it.  I usually get the Brussels sprouts because they are an amazing and unique appetizer they have.
Great atomsphere and cocktails!

What a fabulous dinner! My son suggested Plumb Oyster Bar on 2nd Street in Troy,NY. There is ample street parking and the area is well-lit. Plumb is an upscale bar/restaurant with a nice variety of entrees. My husband and son had the steak …
Fresh and delicious oyster. Drinks were really good. Great and attentive staffs. Reasonable price. Strongly recommend.

I had their PEI mussels just before Christmas, and they were amazing. Delicious and perfectly cooked--not even one unopened mussel out of 30 or so. Even the bread they served it with was great. And the service was surprisingly fast, considering it was a busy Friday night. Would absolutely recommend.
Very eclectic little bar!!
Have had dinner there a few times, wait staff is awesome. Good is great and therew owners are incredible. If you in downtown Troy this place is worth the trip.
I will keep it simple and say this place has the best food and drinks in Troy.
They changed $2 for an ice cube in wiskey
Food is delicious as well as the cocktails. Neat place, good atmosphere, good service. I'll be going back here.
$1 Oysters during happy hour, 4pm-6pm
Excellent food and space. A bit loud but they lowered the volume for the group. Would go again!!
The fries were amazing and some of the best I have ever had. The service was great, and the owner is an awesome person!
Great food and atmosphere.  In Troy but could compete in NYC

The minute you walk in the door - Perfect lighting - Classy, but somehow laid back - It just feels right. Sit down - knowledgeable staff who genuinely care about your experience Food - Chef knows what he is doing, and you never know when …

The oysters are incredible, and the cocktails are to die for. I got the French Smoke that has a perfect blend of sweetness and smokiness, but they could tone down the bitters just a tad and let the mezcal shine through. Bacon wrapped …

We sat at bar for happy hour, and had great oysters and cocktails. We decided to hang out for dinner, and ordered the Burrata and Steak Frites. The Burrata was amazing...with a slightly cumin flavor which was uncommon with typical burrata …
I love this place. Great food, great ambiance, and fantastic oysters. A must visit in the capital region.
Good for small bites to eat and great mixed drinks in a more up scale environment
Best oyster bar on the whole east coast

Great little spot with a variety of fresh oysters. Staff is knowledgeable and friendly. If you go for brunch make sure to try the smashed potato things. Amazing. Mixed drinks are delicious and they have a decent beer selection.
Great serve by Lynsey! Great find in Troy. Loved the music! Bathroom stink like fish, was the worst!!!

They do the best job with the latest foodie fad,roasted brussel sprouts.very generous portion . Easily 4 people can share it generously. Mussels  were great.broth was substantial,not greasy like some places. I mark them down on the bar. …
Great place. Delicious menu and decent selection of oysters
Best Brussels sprouts.  Pricey but great.
Great food and drink selection.
Great food, great service. Super good oysters, very fresh, great variety
Great selection of oysters!
Great food and friendly staff. Went there for a date night and had the warmed olive and rosemary appetizer and an assortment of fresh oysters from both coasts. We can't wait to go back!
Great, knowledgeable bar tenders with a nice, original cocktail menu

What a great dining experience! The decor, atmosphere and music were on point and the waitstaff were very pleasant, attentive and helpful. We started off with some oysters, which were really great (my first time trying them!), and we …
Fantastic Oysters. Great Menu. Yummy wine. Good service. Nice trendy atmosphere What's not to love? I left at 7pm, wishing I could go back now, lol.
Always a great meal and attentive service!
fresh, delicious oysters prepared well! we had a large group that stressed the lightweight mid-week service staff but they performed admirably. tasty!
definitely check out Plumb Oyster Bar, its impressive- the food and drinks.
Charged extra for oyster sauce. Oysters overpriced
Really good food and service. Only room for improvement were that the fries, of all things, were slightly overlooked. They we're crunchy like potato chips.
Good food and enthusiastic service. Lovely wine list.
(Translated by Google) A great evening in good company. Very good food. Any time.  (Original) Ein toller Abend in guter Gesellschaft. Sehr gutes Essen. Jederzeit wieder.
Great food food and great service. Bartender rocked our drinks when we just had us make us drinks that weren't on the menu. Look forward to going again.

The upside is the oysters are delicious and they offer some decent drinks, haven't seen a Michelada on the menu since Mexico! I was pretty underwhelmed by the brunch and the service however, the black bean burger was pretty heavy with …
What a fun, delicious and educational evening we had! The food was awesome and the bartender was informative. We learned about oysters and alcohol that night. Definitely recommend!

This place genuinely has a little for everyone.  I tend to focus on the alcohol side of things, and they excel there. The cocktails are very well made, there's a great beer list (cans and draft) and good variety on the wine list.  For food, …

This is one of my favorite restaurants!  The food is always great and the cocktails are THE BEST in the area, not to mention the oysters.  I particularly recommend the Saturday Brunch and the beet juice Bloody Mary!
Great vibe, oyster happy hour sure to please.

We had delicious cocktails here, and the bartender was extremely knowledgeable (I asked the difference between Scotch, whiskey, and rye and got the best answer I could imagine). We're considering the back space for an event.
Great food.  Great staff
Awesome place, great waitress, and of course food was great also.
Great cocktails, tasty oysters, what's not to like?
Fantastic menu
We stopped on St. Patrick's day, great oysters, nice break from noise on Street and the cold.
Wow, what a delight! This place over delivered on all fronts, food, drink, service, all amazing. Really impressed!
Great place to get a variety of fresh oysters on the half shell! Had a great experience here and will be frequenting on special occasions!

I have eaten here several times now and everything I've had has been perfect. From the wait staff, to the food, and drinks everything well exceeded my expectations and I will be coming back here again.
Always a great experience! Haven't had a cocktail I didn't like.

An amazing experience in all aspects.  The majority of the seating is stools at the oyster bar, the regular bar, or a few high tops on the side. There are two tables in the back with traditional chairs with backs.  The menu is small and …

My fiancé and I dined at Plumb Oyster Bar for the first time last night and the experience was divine! We thoroughly enjoy Troy from the local perspective. I wish we had visited this establishment sooner! Walking in, the atmosphere is …
Ridiculously slow bar service,  but great drinks. Wine arrived at the end of the meal.
Great staff, great cocktails, and amazing oysters
Great new place.  Reasonably priced.  "A hot ticket".

Plumb Oyster Bar and its staff were the first things that made me feel at home in Troy. Heidi quickly became one of my role models and Molly my most trusted adviser and confidante. The food is impeccable -- never had a bad experience -- and …

Extremely disappointed in the service. Food is good. A bit loud for my tastes. Oyster bar is worth it, come early for the $1 oysters. If you like loud bar environments, this one is sweet. I prefer quiet dining

Without a doubt the best restaurant in Troy, if not in the Capital Region. I've lived in the area my entire life, born and raised in a family of cooks and restaurant owners, and I can't speak highly enough of my experience at Plumb. The …

Our first visit was on a very packed Troy Stroll afternoon, so we were not expecting anything anywhere near as wonderful an experience as we had.    We sat at the bar and had great service, wonderful drinks and very delicious food.  Can't …

This was by the far the best experience my wife and I have had in a very long time....By chance we spent the evenings with the owners and their very exceptional and inventive bartender, Colin (photo-right)... Although all (3) were extremely …
Had a fantastic meal here with friends a few weeks ago. Great selection of oysters and the rest of the menu was outstanding. Cool, interesting drinks as well. Fun spot. we'll be going back.

One of the best spots in Troy for a great meal, date night or a special occasion. Food is excellent, cocktails are well crafted and interesting in concept, oysters are unparalleled. The service is also very friendly and attentive. Prices …
Great food. Cozy atmosphere.

This was an excellent experience. We came in early while the place was still very empty, but the staff was extremely courteous, helpful with selections, and friendly. The bar was excellent and made a great martini. While I don't like …
Great place, one of the best atmospheres around
Service. Food. Ambiance. Drinks! Oysters!!  This is a great spot. The team led by Heidi is wonderful. Drinks are good. Food is good!  Oysters are exceptional!! Low key place, but top quality
Best sausage this side of the Hudson!
Fun place. I love oysters and they have a great selection, fresh and good. The drinks are really creative as well.
Fantastic food and service. Inventive, flavorful, and fun.
Great ambiance, food, and cocktails. You might want to make a reservation since it is on the smaller side.
Everything about this place is wonderful. From ownership, presentation, originality, Service and imagination.  Great job
Oysters are fresh, mignonette sauce is just ok. Very friendly staff and pleasant environment. Prices are high for the level of food and services offered.
Three medium size shrimp each on top of a small bite of polenta is not an entree but it did taste very good.  If the portions are going to be that small they should at least serve bread.
Great selection of oysters, $1.50 oysters Tuesday-Thursday after 9PM.

Amazing date night with my husband. We live in Saratoga but happen to be in Troy tonight. We walked in with no reservations and the owner Heidi was so wonderful and personable in helping us get a table. We are HUHE oyster fans and this …
Interesting concept. Nice ambiance. I had beet risotto and it was okay.
Pretty fun place.  The oysters are awesome and the cocktails are BOMB.
Loved meeting the owner Heidi, The atmosphere was very pleasant. Alex our waitress was presently personable.  The Oysters were Amazing!  Definitely my wife and I will return.
7:30pm and they ran out of all oysters. We promptly left extremely disappointed.
Lovely spot to drop in for some classy cocktails and a few oysters. The staff is warm and welcoming, we will definitely be back!!
